EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Atul, Unfortunately, no. I enter the data in our system and then it generates a PDF. I unfortunately do not have an excel version of the document. Please let me know if you have any other scenarios you would like for me to run. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Atul Sanghi [mailto:sanghiconsulting@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2012 7:03 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up Hi, thanks for this spreadsheet. Is there any way you can send me this in .xls? I am the kind of person that needs to see how it works. Thanks, AtulOn Mon, Apr 23, 2012 at 3:23 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:Dear Atool , It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. I have also attached your net cash estimate above (please give me a quick ring to reivew at your convienience.) We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
